title: Huge LEGO Harry Potter sale spotted at Argos - and everything has money off
text:

Everything LEGO just got a whole lot cheaper, as Argos has just launched a special festive discount code, that gets you 10% off all LEGO toys.

The discount code works on all things LEGO at Argos apart from gaming items, meaning that even products that are already on sale can get some extra money off.

To get the discount, simply enter the code LEGO10 at the checkout, or if you're shopping in store, just mention it to staff at the till.

You can use it on everything apart from gaming, meaning that the famous LEGO Harry Potter advent calendar is included, now £17.55, which quickly sold out last year and still costs £24.99 on the LEGO website.

Originally spotted by bargain hunters on deals forum HotUKDeals , shoppers have also been sharing their best finds online - and unsurprisingly, it includes a lot of LEGO Harry Potter.

For example, the Harry Potter LEGO Knight Bus is now just £23.85 at Argos, with the same toy setting you back £34.99 at the LEGO store.

Meanwhile the Hogwarts Clock Tower is £61.20, rather than its usual £68, coming complete with eight minifigures and iconic locations from the Prisoner of Azkaban and the Goblet of Fire.

The 10% off LEGO discount is all part of Argos' Crazy Codes event, in which the brand will be announcing a new discount code every week in the run up to Christmas.

Often featuring at the top of many Christmas lists, the code is perfect for anyone getting their shopping done early, with the 10% off LEGO code will last until Tuesday 29 October, when it will expire to make way for a new discount code instead... Who needs Black Friday ?
description: Just in time for Christmas, Argos has announced a 10% off discount code - and it even works on sale items
